# Cache System Dependencies

# Redis adapter (L2 cache) - OPTIONAL
# Install with: pip install redis
redis>=5.0.0

# Semantic similarity (for LLM response cache) - OPTIONAL
# Install with: pip install sentence-transformers
# sentence-transformers>=2.2.0

# Notes:
# - redis is OPTIONAL - cache will work without it (L1 only)
# - sentence-transformers is OPTIONAL - semantic cache will use exact match only
# - Both dependencies gracefully degrade if not installed
